events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I would like to request a refund as it does not fit properly and I no longer want to keep it.
The customer's request about wanting a refund due to size issues has been categorized under the Refund cluster for further processing.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Emma to handle the refund request promptly and provide assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your recent purchase. I'm here to help you with your refund request and answer any questions you may have.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or has any damage to assist with the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new, still with the tags attached and has no defects or wear at all.
Thank you for the information. You are eligible for a full refund. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid label I will provide shortly.
Thank you, that sounds great. I appreciate the quick response and will send the item back today using the label you send me.
We have sent the prepaid shipping label to your email. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed promptly. Please let us know if you need any further help.
Just following up to confirm if you've managed to send the jacket back and if you have any questions about the refund process.
Yes, I sent the jacket back yesterday via the prepaid label. I am waiting for the refund to be processed and appreciate your assistance.
We have processed your refund today. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days. Thank you for your patience.
Your refund case has been closed successfully. Please reach out if you need any further assistance in the future.
We have sent you a short survey to gather feedback on your recent support experience. We appreciate your time.
